mapper.select: select distinct t.pkg_code,t.pkg_name from D_ZB_PKG t inner join I_GX_T_PRICE_LIST t1 on t1.biaoduanbh=t.pkg_code where substring_index(t1.item_wlmc , '\\', 1) = #{metaName}

select distinct t.prj_code,t.prj_name from D_ZB_PRJ t inner join D_ZB_PKG t1 on t1.prj_code=t.prj_code inner join I_GX_T_PRICE_LIST t2 on t2.biaoduanbh=t1.pkg_code where substring_index(t2.item_wlmc , '\\', 1) = #{metaName}
select distinct document_name from I_ZB_LINE_PRJ_SUPPL where mate_name= #{metaName}

select distinct t.cust_name from D_ZB_PRJ t inner join D_ZB_PKG t1 on t1.prj_code=t.prj_code inner join I_GX_T_PRICE_LIST t2 on t2.biaoduanbh=t1.pkg_code where substring_index(t2.item_wlmc , '\\', 1) = #{metaName}

SELECT distinct t.prj_code,t.prj_name, t.cust_name,t.tendering_content, t.prj_type, t.industry_name, t.prj_nature, t.pm_name, t.entrust_amt, DATE_FORMAT(t.set_time,'%Y-%m-%d') set_time FROM D_ZB_PRJ t where t.prj_name like concat('%', #{prjName}, '%')

select distinct t.prj_code,t.prj_name,t1.cust_name,t.prj_leader,t.prj_state,t.industry_name,t.prj_type,t.consultation_type, t.consultation_method,t.entrust_time,t.approve_amt,t.prj_file_time from D_PRJ_MANUFACTUR_COST t inner join D_CUST t1 on t1.cust_document_code = t.document_code where t.prj_name like concat('%', #{prjName}, '%')

select t.id, t.cust_name,t.cust_short_name,t.addr_and_tel,t.provinces,t.provinces_code,t.city,t.city_code,t.county, t.cust_document_code,t.cust_blk,t.group_unit,t.group_unit_code,t.ext_unit,t.ext_unit_code, t.pid,t.p_cust_name from D_CUST t where t.cust_name like concat('%', #{custName}, '%')
select t.* from D_ZB_PRJ t where t.prj_code = #{prjCode}

select distinct t.prj_code, t2.BUILD_PRJ_NAME as build_prj_id,t.prj_name,t.consultation_type,t.prj_leader, DATE_FORMAT(t.prj_begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d') prj_begin_time, t.contract_id, t.consultation_method,t.dept3_name, DATE_FORMAT(t.prj_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') prj_end_time, t. organization_amt,t.report_amt,t.approve_amt, t.prj_code,t1.cust_name,t.prj_state,t.industry_name,t.prj_type, DATE_FORMAT(t.entrust_time,'%Y-%m-%d') entrust_time, t.DOCUMENT_NAME from D_PRJ_MANUFACTUR_COST t inner join D_CUST t1 on t1.cust_document_code = t.document_code inner join I_PRJ_BUILD_MANUFACTUR t2 on t2.BUILD_PRJ_ID = t.build_prj_id where t.prj_code = #{prjCode}
